body:
The issue is caused by how the openfoam-org upstream decided _their_ internal name for `aarch64`.

Timeline:
- Dec-2017 : ARM64 support was added to openfoam.com (for the v1712 release)
- Jan-2018 : added support for ARM64 to the spack package.
- Jun-2020 : Arm64 support was added to openfoam.org

This unnecessary incompatibility has prompted a few users to attempt various solutions (#19622, #19743, #17906). Unfortunately they all add too much code bloat, potential breakage etc.
title: improve handling of name differences in openfoam / openfoam-org
